input.sentences: winter wonderland is my favorite place .
we looked at a great nativity .
there was a big beautiful statue .
even the carosuel was lit up .
output.sentences: We decided it was a nice night to go to the Winter Carnival.
They had beautiful music playing with a simple angle scene depicted in the trees.
There was a petting zoo with reindeer for the children to see.
We were able to sneak into the back and found props for a pirate show!
Dad won me a prize at the carnival games!
